issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I've done everything I can find on forums, stack etc and there seem to be no answers. I delete everything reinstall etc but the ios simulator just won't run and keeps failing here:

[INFO] :   Focusing the iOS Simulator
[ERROR] :  Project failed to build after 15s 329ms

Help!
fields.summary: Project failed to build error in studio for iOS simulator
fields.environment: Running OSX 10.9.4, xcode and iOS 8 installed sdk 3.3.0GA

comments.body:
Hello,
if you want to use Xcode 6 and iOS8, you need to get Ti Studio 3.4 and Mobile SDK 3.4. Go to the Appcelerator Developer Blog in order to learn how to setup the RC version of 3.4. 

BEst Regards!
